languages.text: "Жаждущие пагубы! Вас ждет изысканная схватка! Кровавые прозелиты сойдутся с утонченными убийцами кабала Ядовитого шепота. А отряд претендентов, уже переживших один бой на арене, сразятся со свежими боевыми невольниками кабала Уязвленных небес!"

"Thirsters of woe! An exquisite strife awaits you! The Bloodstained Proselytes will face the sophisticated killers of the Kabal of the Poisonous Whisper. And the challengers who have already survived one fight in the arena will go up against fresh battle meat provided by the Kabal of the Wounded Skies!"
languages.original_text: "Жаждущие пагубы! Вас ждет изысканная схватка! Кровавые прозелиты сойдутся с утонченными убийцами кабала Ядовитого шепота. А отряд претендентов, уже переживших один бой на арене, сразятся со свежими боевыми невольниками кабала Уязвленных небес!"

languages.text: « Amateurs de tourments ! Une délicieuse lutte vous attend ! Les Prosélytes sanglants sont sur le point d'affronter de talentueux assassins de la Kabale du Murmure empoisonné. Et les combattants ayant déjà survécu à une bataille dans l'arène affronteront la chair fraîche fournie par la Kabale des Cieux blessés ! »
languages.original_text: "Thirsters of woe! An exquisite strife awaits you! The Bloodstained Proselytes will face the sophisticated killers of the Kabal of the Poisonous Whisper. And the challengers who have already survived one fight in the arena will go up against fresh battle meat provided by the Kabal of the Wounded Skies!"

traits.locale_text: « Amateurs de tourments ! Une délicieuse lutte vous attend ! Les Prosélytes Entachés de sang sont sur le point d'affronter de talentueux assassins de la Kabale du Murmure empoisonné. Et les combattants ayant déjà survécu à une bataille dans l'arène affronteront la chair fraîche fournie par la Kabale des Cieux blessés ! »

languages.text: “渴求痛苦之人啊！激烈的争斗正在等待各位！血腥叛党接下来将要面对毒语阴谋团老练的杀手！而那些在竞技场中存活下来的挑战者，将会面对裂空阴谋团提供的活畜！”
languages.original_text: "Thirsters of woe! An exquisite strife awaits you! The Bloodstained Proselytes will face the sophisticated killers of the Kabal of the Poisonous Whisper. And the challengers who have already survived one fight in the arena will go up against fresh battle meat provided by the Kabal of the Wounded Skies!"

traits.locale_text: “渴求痛苦之人啊！激烈的争斗正在等待各位！血腥叛党接下来将要面对毒语阴谋团老练的杀手！而那些在竞技场中存活下来的挑战者，将会面对裂空阴谋团提供的活畜！”

languages.text: 「苦痛に渇きし者たちよ！極上の戦いがお前たちを待っているぞ！“血まみれの改宗者たち”が立ち向かうは、陰謀団〈毒の囁き〉の凄腕の殺し屋たち。そしてすでに一戦を生き延びた挑戦者たちは、陰謀団〈傷つきし空〉が提供する全く新たな戦いに臨む！」
languages.original_text: "Thirsters of woe! An exquisite strife awaits you! The Bloodstained Proselytes will face the sophisticated killers of the Kabal of the Poisonous Whisper. And the challengers who have already survived one fight in the arena will go up against fresh battle meat provided by the Kabal of the Wounded Skies!"

traits.locale_text: 「苦痛に渇きし者たちよ！極上の戦いがお前たちを待っているぞ！“血まみれの改宗者たち”が立ち向かうは、陰謀団〈毒の囁き〉の凄腕の殺し屋たち。そしてすでに一戦を生き延びた挑戦者たちは、陰謀団〈傷つきし空〉が提供する全く新たな戦いに臨む！」

languages.text: "Nach Leid Dürstende! Euch erwartet ein exquisiter Kampf! Die blutigen Bekehrten treten gegen die gewieften Mörder der Kabale des giftigen Geflüsters an. Und die Herausforderer, die bereits einen Kampf in der Arena überlebt haben, treten gegen frisches Schlachtfleisch an – die Kabale der verwundeten Himmel!"
languages.original_text: "Thirsters of woe! An exquisite strife awaits you! The Bloodstained Proselytes will face the sophisticated killers of the Kabal of the Poisonous Whisper. And the challengers who have already survived one fight in the arena will go up against fresh battle meat provided by the Kabal of the Wounded Skies!"

traits.locale_text: "Nach Leid Dürstende! Euch erwartet ein exquisiter Kampf! Die blutigen Bekehrten treten gegen die gewieften Mörder der Kabale des giftigen Geflüsters an. Und die Herausforderer, die bereits einen Kampf in der Arena überlebt haben, treten gegen frisches Schlachtfleisch an – die Kabale der verwundeten Himmel!"

languages.text: «¡Sibaritas del suplicio: os aguarda un exquisito banquete! Los Prosélitos Ensangrentados se enfrentarán a los sofisticados asesinos de la Kábala del Susurro Venenoso. ¡Y los aspirantes que ya han sobrevivido a un combate en la arena lucharán contra carne fresca de cañón proporcionada por la Kábala de los Cielos Heridos!».
languages.original_text: "Thirsters of woe! An exquisite strife awaits you! The Bloodstained Proselytes will face the sophisticated killers of the Kabal of the Poisonous Whisper. And the challengers who have already survived one fight in the arena will go up against fresh battle meat provided by the Kabal of the Wounded Skies!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Sibaritas del suplicio: os aguarda un exquisito banquete! Los Prosélitos Ensangrentados se enfrentarán a los sofisticados asesinos de la Kábala del Susurro Venenoso. ¡Y los aspirantes que ya han sobrevivido a un combate en la arena lucharán contra carne fresca de cañón proporcionada por la Kábala de los Cielos Heridos!».

languages.text: "Kedere aç olanlar! Eşi benzeri görülmemiş bir arbede sizi bekliyor! Kızıl Zındıklar, Zehirli Fısıltı Kabalı'nın rafine katilleriyle yüzleşecek. Arenadaki savaşı yeni atlatanlar da Yaralı Gökler Kabalı'nın sunduğu taze etlere karşı savaşacak!"
languages.original_text: "Thirsters of woe! An exquisite strife awaits you! The Bloodstained Proselytes will face the sophisticated killers of the Kabal of the Poisonous Whisper. And the challengers who have already survived one fight in the arena will go up against fresh battle meat provided by the Kabal of the Wounded Skies!"
